did.unittitle: Latvijas PSR Valsts Drošības Komiteja [Latvian KGB] selected records

scopecontent.head: Abstract
scopecontent.p: Reports and other documents relating to secret police activities in Latvia. Digital copies.

originalsloc.head: Location of Original Materials
originalsloc.p: Originals in: Latvijas Valsts Vēstures Arhīvs, Riga, Latvia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research. Users must sign use agreement.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] (Digital copy), [Record number], Latvijas PSR Valsts Drošības Komiteja selected records, Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2016.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Latvian branch of the Soviet secret police organization Komitet gosudarstvennoǐ bezopasnosti.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Reports and other documents relating to secret police activities in Latvia. Digital copies.
